{{cpp/experimental/ranges/tagged/title|tagged}}
{{cpp/experimental/ranges/utility/tagged/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|num=1|1=
using Base::Base;
}}
{{dcl|num=2|1=
tagged() = default;
}}
{{dcl|num=3|1=
tagged( tagged&amp;&amp; that ) = default;
}}
{{dcl|num=4|1=
tagged( const tagged&amp; that ) = default;
}}
{{dcl|num=5|1=
tagged( Base&amp;&amp; that ) noexcept(std::is_nothrow_move_constructible&lt;Base&gt;::value)
    requires MoveConstructible&lt;Base&gt;;
}}
{{dcl|num=6|1=
tagged( const Base&amp; that ) noexcept(std::is_nothrow_copy_constructible&lt;Base&gt;::value)
    requires CopyConstructible&lt;Base&gt;;
}}
{{dcl|num=7|1=
template&lt; class Other &gt;
    requires Constructible&lt;Base, Other&gt;
constexpr tagged( ranges::tagged&lt;Other, Tags...&gt; &amp;&amp; that )
    noexcept(std::is_nothrow_constructible&lt;Base, Other&gt;::value);
}}
{{dcl|num=8|1=
template&lt; class Other &gt;
    requires Constructible&lt;Base, const Other&amp;&gt;
constexpr tagged( const ranges::tagged&lt;Other, Tags...&gt; &amp;that );
}}
{{dcl end}}
Constructs a {{tt|tagged}} object.

@1@ {{tt|tagged&lt;Base, Tags...&gt;}} inherits the constructors of {{tt|Base}}.
@2-4@ {{tt|tagged}} has defaulted default, copy, and move constructors that invoke the corresponding constructor of {{tt|Base}}.
@5@ Converting move constructor from {{tt|Base}}. Initializes the {{tt|Base}} subobject with {{c|std::move(that)}}.
@6@ Converting copy constructor from {{tt|Base}}. Initializes the {{tt|Base}} subobject with {{c|that}}.
@7@ Converting move constructor from a different {{tt|tagged}} specialization with matching tags.  Initializes the {{tt|Base}} subobject with {{c|static_cast&lt;Other&amp;&amp;&gt;(that)}}.
@8@ Converting copy constructor from a different {{tt|tagged}} specialization with matching tags.  Initializes the {{tt|Base}} subobject with {{c|static_cast&lt;const Other&amp;&gt;(that)}}.
